content.body: i understand the rationale, but i think it’d be better to catch as many things as possible before runtime even if we can’t catch them all.
I think it just adds arbitrary complexity to the spec and to implementations, not to mention the additional overhead during parse and static semantics evaluation, for almost no gain.
content.formatted_body: I think it just adds arbitrary complexity to the spec and to implementations, not to mention the additional overhead during parse and static semantics evaluation, for almost no gain.
